snippet.title: Super Ultra Dead Rising 3' Arcade Remix Hyper Edition EX + α - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
An all new four-player co-op mode for Dead Rising 3! Play as classic Dead Rising heroes (Frank and Chuck are back!) or cosplay as your favorite Capcom characters to use their signature attacks and super moves to save the city. 

Compete for the top score, unlock new characters and fight for survival in Capcom style!

'Like' Dead Rising on Facebook
http://www.facebook.com/deadrising

Follow Dead Rising on Twitter
http://twitter.com/DeadRising

http://xbox.com/DeadRising3

©CAPCOM CO., LTD. ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
